TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdRotatorDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In a visual designer, when you switch from source view to design view, the markup that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> control is parsed. A design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. When you switch back to source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup for the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Generates the markup that is used to render the control on the design surface.
Docs.returns: The markup that represents the control on the design surface.

remarks.format:
## Examples For a code example that shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a templated data-bound control designer, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
If the control that is associated with this designer has templates, it displays the templates in the designer.
